Tychus.name: Overkill
Tychus.description: Deal 645 (+4% per level) damage to the target and 315 (+4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

Tychus.name: Frag Grenade
Tychus.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

Tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
Tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

Tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
Tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

Tychus.name: Minigun
Tychus.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

TychusOdin.name: Annihilate
TychusOdin.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

TychusOdin.name: Ragnarok Missiles
TychusOdin.description: Launches a missile at each nearby enemy, dealing 141 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: Combat Tactician
1.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

1.name: Dash
1.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases your Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe you gather, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.  Reward: Once you have gathered 25 Regeneration Globes, also increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%.

1.name: Press the Advantage
1.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

4.name: In the Rhythm
4.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.name: Master Assassin
4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase your Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, your Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...
4.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

7.name: Concussion Grenade
7.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

7.name: Quarterback
7.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.name: Relentless Soldier
7.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: Neosteel Coating
13.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

13.name: That's the Stuff!
13.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

16.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
16.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

16.name: Lead Rain
16.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

16.name: Titan Grenade
16.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
20.description: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.
